docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Pennsylvania authorities have obtained an arrest warrant for a Florida man they say uses classified advertising in rural areas to entice unwed pregnant teen-agers to give up their babies for adoption by affluent couples, many of them in New York.

headline.main: Baby Brokering: Desperate Girl's Case Reveals Shadowy World
